author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HENRIETTE BARELY A TROPICAL STORM... ...FORECAST TO RESTRENGTHEN IN A FEW DAYS...
summary: ...HENRIETTE BARELY A TROPICAL STORM... ...FORECAST TO RESTRENGTHEN IN A FEW DAYS... As of 5:00 AM HST Fri Aug 08 the center of Henriette was located near 19.7, -141.5 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HENRIETTE BARELY A TROPICAL STORM... ...FORECAST TO RESTRENGTHEN IN A FEW DAYS... As of 5:00 AM HST Fri Aug 08 the center of Henriette was located near 19.7, -141.5 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Henriette (EP3/EP082025)
